text: Alexander Muir was a Scottish professional football full back who made over 150 appearances in the Scottish League for Albion Rovers. == References == Category:Brentford F.C. wartime guest players Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Place of birth missing Category:Burnbank Athletic F.C. players Category:Albion Rovers F.C. players Category:Fulham F.C. wartime guest players Category:Crystal Palace F.C. wartime guest players Category:Tottenham Hotspur F.C. wartime guest players Category:Clapton Orient F.C. wartime guest players
title: Alex Muir (Albion Rovers footballer)
